website_summaries.verdict: This durable, innovative, and cute 2-pack of toys is even better when you learn how to help Dora train Perrito to sit, lie down, talk, and dance on his hind legs.
pros: Dora’s cute dog Perrito does tricks as she moves her arm
Dora talks in English and Spanish
cons: Dora may need help to stand on her own

customer_reviews.title: Purchased this for my great niece's birthday
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this for my great niece's birthday. It was a big hit with the kids. They loved pushing the button and watching the little dog do its tricks and listen to Dora talk. This doll was larger than I expected and made well. Definitely happy with this purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Puntermom

customer_reviews.title: Sold broke toy
customer_reviews.text: The dog didn't even work. I couldn't even return the doll because it was a birthday gift. I couldn't take it away from the girl. The dora still talked
customer_reviews.author: Moniquika Sutton

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Seems to be good quality and working out well not complaints thus far.
customer_reviews.author: Sergio A.

customer_reviews.title: Very funny
customer_reviews.text: My daughter is very happy with her new doll. Everything working well and bring so much fun.
customer_reviews.author: Jefferson Alves

customer_reviews.title: "Not"
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my grandchild for Christmas. Disappointed the toy does not work as advertised. Very unfriendly to interact with!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Got a great price for this but leash is way too small ...
customer_reviews.text: Got a great price for this but leash is way too small on dog and they keep coming apart. Daughter fast got tired if this and it just layed around house unplayed with. Was cute at first but Dora kept falling over.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Morales

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: these are adorable bought them for Christmas gifts for great grandaughters
customer_reviews.author: barbara stanbrough

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: My daughter really loves this toy. She is 3 and really enjoys that Dora walks her dog.
customer_reviews.author: gladys Hernandez

customer_reviews.title: We found the best price on Amazon just like we often do
customer_reviews.text: My daughter loves this toy! We found the best price on Amazon just like we often do!
customer_reviews.author: Jessica Lasher

customer_reviews.title: She is so happy! It’s really good toy for kid
customer_reviews.text: I’ve bought this set for my granddaughter. She is so happy! It’s really good toy for kid. She has an almost real dog
customer_reviews.author: Olga Vasylieva

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Not very magical, but cute enough. Doesn't really hold my 2 year old's attention for long.
customer_reviews.author: addicted to my kindle

customer_reviews.title: Unhappy granddaughter
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for granddaughter for Christmas and it does not work. Now we are stuck with a toy that does not work because the window to return it has expired.
customer_reviews.author: Anita Jones

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: My kids like playing with this toy. Very satisfied toy. No issue at all.
customer_reviews.author: EKKO

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: Dora doesn't balance well and my three year old gets frustrated when the dog pulls Dora down.
customer_reviews.author: DaisyBee

customer_reviews.title: Great toy for the price.
customer_reviews.text: My 4 years old daughter loves Dora and this Perrito makes this gift even better . The puppy makes a little of movements. Good purchase/gift.
customer_reviews.author: Euro Baby

customer_reviews.title: Dora and Friends
customer_reviews.text: My granddaughter love it the dog and Dora along with the Spanish is great
customer_reviews.author: Regina

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Very nice Toy set ,my grand daughter plays with her friends.
customer_reviews.author: Lucky Grandma

customer_reviews.title: Very cute toy. My 4 year old daughter really ...
customer_reviews.text: Very cute toy. My 4 year old daughter really enjoys playing with it.
customer_reviews.author: Chris

customer_reviews.title: We cannot get our train and play perdition to do ...
customer_reviews.text: We cannot get our train and play perdition to do anything other than walk and Dora keeps repeating the same thing over and over. We tried turning her off and back on and we tried taking the batteries out and putting them back in but nothing has worked so far!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: RECEIVED FAULT PIECE. NEVER WORKED
customer_reviews.text: We bought 2 and gave 1 as gift. We later opened the other one at home, assembled and it never worked. The kids waited patiently until we tried to fix and make it work and when we finally gave up they were very disappointed. I hope the one we gave as gift works otherwise it would be very embarrassing.
customer_reviews.author: Deepika

customer_reviews.title: Great doll!
customer_reviews.text: My granddaughter loves this doll! Works as advertised and is very sturdy.
customer_reviews.author: LacrosseMom

customer_reviews.title: Granddaughter who is 4 asks for this for Christmas from ...
customer_reviews.text: Granddaughter who is 4 asks for this for Christmas from the television commercials. Was so excited when she opened Dora and her Training dog!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Dora lover
customer_reviews.text: Got this for my niece's 2nd birthday and she absolutely loved it.. even one my year old son liked it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: It took longer than expected to arrive but very happy with the product and it included batteries
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Tricks and interactive aspect are cool, but she tips over VERY easily and this ...
customer_reviews.text: Tricks and interactive aspect are cool, but she tips over VERY easily and this was so frustrating to my 3 year old. She tried picking her up 3 or 4 times to have her tip right back over within 30 seconds and then would have nothing more to do with this toy. It's a shame because she loves Dora and this would have been a big hit if she would only stand up independently.
customer_reviews.author: glo100

customer_reviews.title: Nice toy!
customer_reviews.text: My daughter loves this toy! The dog is so cute and she loves positioning Dora to make the dog do the tricks. It would be nice if Dora walked along with the dog. Sometimes she falls over if you don't have her in the exact position. My 3 year old sometimes struggles with this but I assist her so that she can continue playing. Over all its a great toy that provides entertainment.
customer_reviews.author: I'm Just Me

customer_reviews.title: It was a great sucess. She loves that dora talks to perrito
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my neighbors daughter for her birthday. It was a great sucess. She loves that dora talks to perrito. She has play with it endlessly. Dora does has problems standing up on carpet rugs by herself. But with your childs help they can have hours of fun, learn a few catch phrases along the way as well. Sorry I didn;t include a picture because like I said before this was a present for my neighbors daughter. Her mom just gave me all the details.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica Moore

customer_reviews.title: Ola!  we love Dora and Perritto!
customer_reviews.text: What a fun doll to play with. Dora is about 18" tall, nicely made vinyl doll. She has a very easily identifiable, large button on her dress which when pressed plays a comment, command or song in both English and Spanish. It's delightful. Her little dog Perritto moves easily and is fun to watch. My niece enjoys 'talking' with Dora. Sometimes the Spanish is a little hard to grasp if you are unfamiliar with the language, but as everyone knows - with kids you'll hear it at least 500 times so I'm sure I'll catch on! A very nice doll. This is a special time toy with my neice as she's just about 3.
customer_reviews.author: J. Weber

customer_reviews.title: Nice Toy
customer_reviews.text: Dora does not look so much like Dora but I did not really care about this aspect of the toy. for older children in homes with younger siblings this is a good choice because it lacks lots of little pieces. Dora speaks loudly and clearly when the button on her chest is pressed. The dog is cute and they play well together. Children will have to hold Dora upright to play with her. Her hair is long enough for older children to style it. The dog is all plastic. I do not think this will teach children Spanish but for a child who has a heritage with Spanish in the background it is an inclusive toy.
customer_reviews.author: Lynne Hersh

customer_reviews.title: A cute, fun Dora and her puppy Perrito!
customer_reviews.text: What a fun doll for the 3+ girls! Dora looks different than the one my daughter watched several years ago. I guess she has grown up, too. I love that she has longer hair that girls can comb. Dora comes with her puppy, Perrito. She holds his leash in her right hand to make him do his tricks. Dora sings in both Spanish and English which is nice and Perrito bobs his head as he walks. He can also dance. There are several other things Dora and Perrito can do, as long as the leash is plugged into her hand. My two oldest granddaughters, who are 4 & 3, just love playing with Dora and her puppy, Perrito.
customer_reviews.author: Jan Thompson

customer_reviews.title: I pretty well agree with the other 5 star reviews so ...
customer_reviews.text: I pretty well agree with the other 5 star reviews so no point in repeating the same pluses of this toy. However, please check on the Fisher-Price site to purchase. Retail for this toy is $40.00. This will be a birthday present for my almost 4 year old granddaughter. I have personally put the toy through its paces, but I'll update the review once I get the 4 year old perspective!
customer_reviews.author: KIW_0612

customer_reviews.title: Super cute.
customer_reviews.text: Super cute! This doll/dog combo is interactive and very cute. Dora the doll is programmed with 40 phrases (mixed English & Soanish) which she says when a button on her chest is pushed. A leash attaches Perito the dog to her and allows for interactivity depending upon the position of the doll's limbs (dog can sit, lie down, etc) My niece got a big kick out of this doll and loves playing with it.
customer_reviews.author: J. Worth

customer_reviews.title: A toy for my 2 year old granddaughter to grow with
customer_reviews.text: Entertaining for my 2 year old granddaughter though I think her parents and grandfather are more fascinated with it than she is. Well constructed. I was actually impressed with how long this held her interest. The sound is clear and easy to understand. I have no doubt this will be a lasting toy in her toy box (she has other Dora dolls at Nana's house and actively seeks out her Dora dolls when she comes to visit).
customer_reviews.author: M. Wolf

customer_reviews.title: Nice gift idea.
customer_reviews.text: Granddaughter loved this. Worked well and she played with it for a long time.
customer_reviews.author: L. Kelley

customer_reviews.title: Dora
customer_reviews.text: My four year old loves Dora. She cannot get enough of her. Dora is a very nice size doll. She has long hair that my daughter loves to style. She likes to train the dog to do tricks.This is a real nice toy for a child three to nine years old. Once we figured out how to work the doll. The dog worked perfect for us. Overall a great quality product.
customer_reviews.author: michael alexander

customer_reviews.title: So cute
customer_reviews.text: 4 1/2 stars! This doll and her pup Perrito are so adorable! This is the perfect doll for any young animal lover. My only issue is sometimes the button on Dora's chest doesn't respond and I have to press it about 3 times. Other than that I love it. Perrito's tricks are top notch for a plastic pup. :) Dora is a good size, not too small.
customer_reviews.author: T.C.

customer_reviews.title: Fun Play
customer_reviews.text: The animation and look of the doll and puppy is cute, but the construction of these toys feels a bit flimsy. The doll doesn't feel as sturdy or stable to prop up. Though, for imaginary play, the interaction is fun. It's rated for ages 3-6, but I'm wondering about the safety of the smaller pieces for the 3yr old.
customer_reviews.author: OnAmazon

customer_reviews.title: Very Cute
customer_reviews.text: My 2 year old likes this. The toy is educational in that Dora speaks both English and Spanish. This is the grown up version of Dora so it is aimed towards older children. Dora can make Perrito do tricks, and sing and dance. Even my older nieces enjoyed playing with her. It's an adorable doll that is both fun and educational without being "educational".
customer_reviews.author: D.D

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for puppy lovers and Dora fans
customer_reviews.text: This is a cute Dora themed toy. My five year old daughter just loved it. She loves puppies and Dora: so a great combination for her. The dog really can do tricks and she thought that was great. It is cute and adorable for sure but not a cuddly kind of toy. It is more of a "big kid" kind of toy, but ages that appreciate it would range form 4-7 in my opinion. It will please Dora fans, and puppy lovers everywhere.
customer_reviews.author: R. Hayton

customer_reviews.title: Dora ama a su perrito
customer_reviews.text: This toy is so interactive and adorable! The Dora franchise has been consistent because the toys are fun and wholesome. I'm using it to introduce the concept of pet ownership since getting a puppy has been a hot debate for the past six months. The dog does tricks (sit, heel, etc). Although the figures themselves are on the small side I think the toy is worth every penny.
customer_reviews.author: Ariaceliz

customer_reviews.title: Great interactive toy
customer_reviews.text: This is really a cute toy. Especially appropriate in today's world where we either want to be bi-lingual or already are. This toy speaks in two languages, Spanish and English. The "object" of the toy is to teach the dog tricks and to walk. There is a leash, the dog and the doll. Highly recommended and for children from 3 yrs to 6 yrs old.
customer_reviews.author: FiFi's Mom

product_meta.title: Fisher-Price Nickelodeon Dora & Friends, Train and Play Dora and Perrito
product_meta.description:
Product Packaging:Standard PackagingJoin Dora and Perrito on a puppy adventure! You can help Dora take Perrito for a walk and teach him fun tricks like sit, stand, lie down and even high five! When you lift or lower Dora's arm, Perrito will respond to the command like a real puppy! He can dance on his hind legs and even jump up to give Dora a sweet puppy kiss! The more you play, the more Perrito learns! Every day is a friendship adventure when you play together with Dora and Perrito! Includes 11.5'' Dora doll and Perrito.

BRAND STORY
By Fisher Price
feature_bullets: Go on a puppy adventure with Dora and Perrito!
Help Dora train Perrito and teach him tricks like sit, lie down, high five and dance!
Perrito can dance on his hind legs and even jump up to give Dora a sweet puppy kiss!
Raise Dora's arm up and down to see Perrito magically respond to her commands!
Lots of bilingual phrases and magical interaction add to the adventure!

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.4 out of 5 stars148 ratings4.4 out of 5 stars
